metadata.title: President lauds security forces for operation against Khawarij

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Mar 08 (APP):President Asif Ali Zardari Saturday lauded the security forces for carrying out an operation against Khawarij in district Tank. He appreciated the security forces for eliminating three Khawarij during the operation. He said operations against terrorists would continue till the complete eradication of the menace of terrorism. He said the whole nation stood with the security forces in the war against terrorism.
